name: Alerting - adservice
expression: (sum by (service_namespace, service_name) (increase({otel_metric_name = "dash0.spans", service_name = "adservice", service_namespace = "opentelemetry-demo", dash0_operation_name != "", otel_span_status_code = "ERROR"}[5m]))) / (sum by (service_namespace, service_name) (increase({otel_metric_name = "dash0.spans", service_name = "adservice", service_namespace = "opentelemetry-demo", dash0_operation_name != ""}[5m])) > 0)*100 > $__threshold
